description.oldValue:
,View and update (i.e. mark as complete & progress) all the tasks assigned to you across projects in one place – Assigned to Me view. This view appears in the app of their choice – Planner, Tasks in Teams, or ToDo.
GA date: August CY2023
Preview date: June CY2023
